[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "{% set sql = " select sum(if(is_foc=1 or docstatus!=1,0,grand_total)) as total_revenue , coalesce(sum(if(is_foc=1 or docstatus!=1,0,1)),0) as total_order, sum(if(is_foc=1 and docstatus=1,grand_total,0)) as total_foc, sum(if(is_foc=1 and docstatus=1,1,0)) as total_foc_order, coalesce(sum(if(is_foc=1 or docstatus!=1,0,total_quantity)),0) as total_quantity, coalesce(sum(if(is_foc=1 and docstatus=1,total_quantity,0)),0) as total_foc_quantity, sum(if(is_foc=1 and docstatus=1,0,total_discount)) as total_discount, sum(if(is_foc=1 and docstatus=1,0,total_tax)) as total_tax, sum(if( docstatus=0,grand_total,0)) as pending_amount, sum(if( docstatus=0,1,0)) as pending_order, ifnull(sum(if( docstatus=2,1,0)),0) as total_void from `tabSale` where working_day = if('{0}'='',working_day,'{0}') and cashier_shift = if('{1}'='',cashier_shift,'{1}') and ifnull(outlet,'') = if('{2}'='',ifnull(outlet,''),'{2}') and ifnull(tbl_group,'') = if('{3}'='',ifnull(tbl_group,''),'{3}') ".format( (frappe.form_dict.get("working_day") or ""), (frappe.form_dict.get("cashier_shift") or ""), (frappe.form_dict.get("outlet") or ""), (frappe.form_dict.get("table_group") or ""), ) %} {% set data = frappe.db.sql(sql,as_dict=1) %}
